snippet.title: Rolling Sky Switch Release Trailer
snippet.description:
World famous parkour game- "Rolling Sky" is now available on Nintendo Switch eShop 12th April! Published by Rising Win Tech and co-operate with Digital Crafter.

https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/rolling-sky-switch/

In "Rolling Sky", Keep rolling ain’t easy. Players needs to facing variant obstacles constantly in different stages, as a ball. 

- Beware the maze! 
"Rolling Sky" is challenging you! By many of mechanism. Keep the eyes on or you will get in trouble by those trick stuff.

- Switch Joy-Con sensor makes better experiences
Because it is Nintendo Switch, instead of the classic control, now you can have the option to move the ball by Joy-Con sensor. The brand-new gaming experience awaits you to try!

- What makes themes so dazing and funny?
Every stage has their own specific main theme. Forrest, Circus, Universe…etc.
You will be able to see all the amazing view during the running. Well, but stay focus on the road in front of you is also very important though.

- Parkour X Dubstep!!!
"Rolling Sky" has amazing dubstep in every stage.
Get hype and rolling with the awesome music!!!

- Customize your ball
Tones of different skins to let you choose!! Pumpkin lantern, skull, blackhole…etc. All of them are Unlocked and FREE in Nintendo Switch. 

"Rolling Sky" is a parkour running game that will bring you exciting, impressing feeling. It is a game for everyone, Come and try this 
"Rolling Sky"!

for more info:
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/rolling-sky-switch/

Digital Crafter 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/digitalcrafter/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Digital_Crafter
